Package bacnet.scripts.arrayexpress

Class ArrayExpress

java.lang.Object
bacnet.scripts.arrayexpress.ArrayExpress
public class ArrayExpress extends Object
Different methods to curate and parse the different data for Listeriomics website

ONLY METHODS BEFORE FINAL DATA PROCESSING ARE PRESENT HERE
Author:
UIBC

    • curateMatrix

      public static ExpressionMatrix curateMatrix(String dataPath, boolean comparison)
      Read a potential ExpressionMatrix, remove all duplicate rows by calculating mean when 2 or more rows have same name. WARNING: No annotation information is allowed, only real values
      Parameters:
      dataPath -
      comparison - true if it is an ExpressionMatrix for a comparison, if no LOGFC column are found in a row, it will delete the row (gain speed and space)
      Returns:
